attributes.comment:
I am writing in response to your proposed increase in fees for immigration benefit
applications. I understand the dept. of Homeland Security is overloaded with
immigration applications and needs to increase fees. My concern is that Int.l
adoption fees (I-600, N-600 and Certificate of Citizenship for IR-4 children) are
lumped in with the immigration fees. The proposed fees for those applications are
pretty large increases. This will affect thousands of families in the process &
considering adopting children internationally when the cost is already extremely
expensive. Please consider not increasing the fees for Int.l adoption applications.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Stacy Robben
